sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comthconfmhistory ( CONFM_NO /* */ , CONFM_RQESTER_ID /* */ , CONFMER_ID /* */ , CONFM_DE /* */ , CONFM_TY_CODE /* */ , CONFM_STTUS_CODE /* */ , OPERT_TY_CODE /* */ , OPERT_ID /* */ , TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE /* */ , TRGET_JOB_ID /* */ ) VALUES ( #confmNo# /* */ , #confmRqesterId# /* */ , #confmerId# /* */ , #confmDe# /* */ , #confmTyCode# /* */ , #confmSttusCode# /* */ , #opertTyCode# /* */ , #opertId# /* */ , #trgetJobTyCode# /* */ , #trgetJobId# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comthconfmhistory SET CONFM_NO=#confmNo# /* */ , CONFM_RQESTER_ID=#confmRqesterId# /* */ , CONFMER_ID=#confmerId# /* */ , CONFM_DE=#confmDe# /* */ , CONFM_TY_CODE=#confmTyCode# /* */ , CONFM_STTUS_CODE=#confmSttusCode# /* */ , OPERT_TY_CODE=#opertTyCode# /* */ , OPERT_ID=#opertId# /* */ , TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE=#trgetJobTyCode# /* */ , TRGET_JOB_ID=#trgetJobId# /* */ WHERE CONFM_NO=#confmNo# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONFM_NO /* */ , CONFM_RQESTER_ID /* */ , CONFMER_ID /* */ , CONFM_DE /* */ , CONFM_TY_CODE /* */ , CONFM_STTUS_CODE /* */ , OPERT_TY_CODE /* */ , OPERT_ID /* */ , TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE /* */ , TRGET_JOB_ID /* */ FROM comthconfmhistory WHERE CONFM_NO=#confmNo# /* */

SELECT CONFM_NO /* */ , CONFM_RQESTER_ID /* */ , CONFMER_ID /* */ , CONFM_DE /* */ , CONFM_TY_CODE /* */ , CONFM_STTUS_CODE /* */ , OPERT_TY_CODE /* */ , OPERT_ID /* */ , TRGET_JOB_TY_CODE /* */ , TRGET_JOB_ID /* */ FROM comthconfmhistory WHERE 1=1
CONFM_NO = #searchKeyword# /* */
CONFM_RQESTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY CONFM_NO DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comthconfmhistory WHERE 1=1
CONFM_NO = #searchKeyword# /* */
CONFM_RQESTER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
